flawed_nl_solution:
There are 4/5 * 2300 = <<4/5*2300=2875>>2875 books in English at the library.
Out of these books, only 3/5 * 2875 = <<3/5*2875=1725>>1725 were published inside the country.
So there are 2875 - 1725 = <<2875-1725=1150>>1150 books in English published outside of the country.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1840, not 2875. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
